TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebApplicationLifetimeEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 表示應用程式存留期中的重大事件。

span.span: Represents a significant event in the lifetime of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 應用程式存留期事件包括事件，例如應用程式啟動和關閉事件。Application lifetime events include events such as application startup and shutdown events. 如果應用程式結束時，您可以檢視相關的事件訊息欄位判斷原因。If an application is terminated, you can determine why by viewing the related event message field. 當執行個體，會發生 ASP.NET 健康監視更新應用程式存留期的事件數效能計數器。When a instance occurs, ASP.NET health monitoring updates the Application Lifetime Events performance counter. 您可以藉由新增記錄這些事件物件`rules`小節的`healthMonitoring`區段的組態檔中，如下列範例所示。You can log these events by adding the object to the `rules` subsection of the `healthMonitoring` section of the configuration file, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 應用程式存留期的事件數效能計數器包含 ASP.NET 存留期的所有事件的總和。The Application Lifetime Events performance counter contains the sum total of all ASP.NET lifetime events. 若要檢視在 系統監視器 (PerfMon)，此效能計數器中**新增計數器**視窗選取**ASP.NET**從**效能物件**下拉式清單。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list. 選取**應用程式存留期事件** 效能計數器，然後按一下**新增** 按鈕。Select the **Application Lifetime Events** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱上的 < 使用 ASP.NET 應用程式與 「 系統監視器 (PerfMon) > [MSDN](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information, see "Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications" on [MSDN](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). 如果您允許的標準記錄事件，您可以在事件檢視器中檢視它們，藉由選取**應用程式**記錄檔。If you allow events to be logged by the standard , you can view them in Event Viewer by selecting the **Application** log. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件檢視器](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=24845&clcid=0x409)TechNet 上 Windows Server 2003 文件中。For more information, see [Event Viewer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=24845&clcid=0x409) in the Windows Server 2003 documentation on TechNet. > [!CAUTION] > 因為物件是大量的事件，記錄就是需要大量資源的而且可能會變慢您的系統。Because the object is a high-volume event, logging it is resource-intensive and might slow down your system. 它也可能會造成其他事件中的情況下，都會覆寫類別由於大量的事件和方法的事件記錄的運作。It can also cause other events to be overwritten in the case of the class due to the high volume of events and the way the event logging works. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 如需範例衍生自類別，請參閱本主題中所提供的範例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生自類別來建立自訂的事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#1)] 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何設定`healthMonitoring`區段的組態檔，以加入`SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent`上面定義 ASP.NET 健康監視系統來的程式碼。The following configuration-file excerpt shows how to configure the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file to add the `SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent` code defined above to the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 若要將事件加入至系統，您必須定義事件加入新項目`eventMappings`區段，並加入新項目，將事件對應至提供者`rules`> 一節。To add the event to the system, you must define the event by adding a new entry to the `eventMappings` section and map the event to a provider by adding a new entry to the `rules` section. ``` // Configure the connection between the // application lifetime event object // and the provider that must process it. ```

para.span: 當格式化顯示您自訂的事件資訊，會覆寫方法而非方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 這會避免覆寫或竄改機密的系統資訊。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體類別，但您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己這個類別會繼承的事件類型時。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式會衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用ASP.NET 自訂健全狀況事件中。The following code example shows how to use the in an ASP.NET custom health event. 這個程式碼範例是主要被要顯示要使用的正確語法。This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您永遠不會使用它來建立的執行個體類別，但您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己這個類別會繼承的事件類型時。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以呼叫建構函式會衍生自類別。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用ASP.NET 自訂健全狀況事件中。The following code example shows how to use the in an ASP.NET custom health event. 這個程式碼範例是主要被要顯示要使用的正確語法。This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#3)]
